text.section: The State shall purchase a bond for each fiduciary in accordance with Title 9, Subtitle 17 of the State Government Article.

section.section: Unless a fiduciary is bonded as required by subsection (a) of this section, the fiduciary may not exercise custody or control of any assets of a State system.
A fiduciary may not allow another fiduciary to act in violation of paragraph (1) of this subsection.

text.section: The bond required by subsection (a) of this section is the only bond required for a fiduciary to exercise custody or control of any assets of a State system.
